Actions.Name: The Block
Actions.Description: The splitter marks a foe in range 3. At the end of that foe's next turn, if they are still marked, the Splitter dashes up to 6 spaces towards them. They must save or take 3[D]+[fray], or [D]+[fray] on a successful save. This ability recharges only if the Splitter picks up a valuables token.
